subject: enabling assertions in junit ant task without enabling fork
msgSnippet: Hi guys, I am running an ant script with a junit task. For some reason, when I use the fork= yes parameter, my script crashes every now and then. If I do not
messageBody:
Hi guys,

I am running an ant script with a junit task.

For some reason, when I use the fork="yes" parameter, my script crashes
every now and then.

If I do not use that parameter, everything works fine.

I would like to enable assertions during unit testing.

with fork="yes", I used the extra jvmarg parameter.

with fork="false", I haven't found the way to do it.

Any idea?

Daniel
